Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class PlayMessageController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.PlayMessageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayMessageReader
public class PlayMessageController extends Object implements PlayMessageReader
This class is run by the executeMessage method of the received PlayMessage to change the PlayState class, and by the view when she needs to send (Normal or Expert) PlayMessages to the server.
